title: Wayfair | L3 | Bangalore
content:
Education: Tier-3
Years of Experience: 5 years 3 months
Current Experience: SDE 2 at e commerce 
Current salary: 36 LPA base , 10 LPA Esops
Date of the Offer: August
Company: Wayfair
Title/Level: SDE 3
Location: Bengaluru
Salary: 65 LPA
Relocation/Signing Bonus: wayfair gives relocation benefits with hotel stay for 2 weeks / packers and movers / flight tickets but everything needs invoice and has a limit
Stock bonus: no
Bonus: no
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 65 LPA

I rejected the offer since I was expecting 70+ LPA and had a competing offer

R1 : DSA ( forgot the question) 
R2: HLD - shazam 
R3: LLD - Supplier side E-commerce app 
R4 : HM - leadership questions , scenario based , past projects

title: Flipkart SDE-1 Bangalore | New Grad | 2024
content:
Education: B.Tech. in CSE (Tier 2)
Years of Experience: 0 Years of FTE
Internship Experience: About 1 year of internship experience (~4 months at established companies + 8 months at startups)

Company: Flipkart
Title/Level: SDE-1
Location: Bangalore

Salary: 18 Lac Base Pay + 1.8 Lac Variable Pay
Relocation/Signing Bonus: 80k Relocation + 3 lakh Joining bonus
Stock bonus: 5.07 lac ESOPs (Vested over 4 years 25% per year)
Bonus: 3 lakh Retention bonus
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 32,57,000
Benefits: 1.69 lac Benefits (including relocation allowance)

Other details:
- Joining Bonus has a clawback period of 2 years from DOJ,
- Retention Bonus has a clawback of 1 year from date of payout,
- The Company will provide you with a one-time relocation allowance of Rs. 80,000 subject to tax deduction. If you decide to terminate the employment with the Company within 12 months from your date of joining; the Company will be entitled to recover the said relocation allowance from you.
